altername_name: KAMEN RIDER memory of heroez Premium Sound Edition
name: Kamen Rider: Memory of Heroez: Premium Sound Edition
overview: When justice intertwines with the songs of your memories… The Premium Sound Edition contains a total of 60 tracks, including opening songs, BGM, and insert songs. A pre-set list of in-game BGMs from the main game is included! Every scene in the game will be accompanied by the music from the game, allowing you to enjoy the ultimate KAMEN RIDER experience. Digital Art Collection is also included in the package, which includes the key visuals and image art of the game.
